author: Bernard Condon, Matt Sedensky and Jennifer Peltz / AP
title: ‘Under Siege’: Brooklyn Nursing Home Reports 55 Deaths
description: Cobble Hill Health Center has become yet another glaring example of the nation’s struggle to control the rapid spread of COVID-19 in nursing homes.
content: (NEW YORK) — As residents at a nursing home in Kirkland, Washington, began dying in late February from a coronavirus outbreak that would eventually take 43 lives, there was little sign of trouble at the Cobble Hill Health Center, a 360-bed facility in an upsc… [+6072 chars]
